rows: Uncommon Skill (subgroups of other skills such as Knowledge (arcane lore) or Craft (structural))
Rare Skill (skills available for a particular classSpellcraft, Psicraft, Use Magic Device)
Specific Combination of Skills, Feats, and Abilities (someone with Knowledge (business) and the ability to cast the auguryspell)
Finding someone willing to perform activities secretly or illegally
Finding someone with a specific level of ability
